moves.1. f4 d5 2. Nf3 g6 3. e4 dxe4 4. Ng5 Nf6: In my opinion the main line of this crazy tournament.
moves.11. Nc3: one variation the stronger might be d4
moves.11... Na6: Probably Bxc3 should have been played White should Play Nxe4 taking the center by storm.
moves.12. a3 Bxc3 13. bxc3: Strange but has the up side of opening up the b-file for the rook.
Here I should have played a6
moves.16... h5 17. Be2: Again a6 could be played here.
moves.19... Kd5 20. c4+ Kd4: Forcing the king forward.  I felt Joanne may have had something after c3+ Kd3 c5+ but who knows.  Joanne wanted to see what other people thought about this combination.
moves.21. Bb2+ Kc5 22. Ba3+ Kd4 23. Bb2+: Draw offer I accept for fear of the earlier mentioned moves.

gameName: The Annotation Project II: Black escapes?
